mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_FEAM_PRTNR_PERF_MM_CL ( BASE_YM , PERF_YM , FEE_TCNT_DV_CD , PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD , PERF_ATC_CD , CO_CD , OG_TP_CD , PRTNR_NO , FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , PERF_VAL , DTA_DL_YN
) SELECT #{perfYm} AS BASE_YM , #{perfYm} AS PERF_YM , #{feeTcntDvCd} AS FEE_TCNT_DV_CD , '101' AS PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD , T.PERF_ATC_CD , '2000' AS CO_CD , 'W01' AS OG_TP_CD , T.PRTNR_NO , T.FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , T.PERF_VAL , 'N' AS DTA_DL_YN
FROM (
SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00020' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* 실활동인원 */ , '' AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , COUNT(T1.PRTNR_NO) AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT O1.BASE_YM , O1.OG_TP_CD , O1.PRTNR_NO , MAX(O2.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO) AS DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO , SUM(F1.PERF_VAL) AS ORD_AMT FROM TB_FEAM_NTORP_CNTR_MM_CL F1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 ON O1.BASE_YM = F1.BASE_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = F1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = F1.PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O2 ON O1.BASE_YM = O2.BASE_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = O2.OG_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND F1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND F1.CNTR_PERF_CRT_DV_CD = '01' AND F1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = #{feeTcntDvCd} AND F1.PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '101' AND F1.PERF_DV_CD = 0 /*개인판매*/ AND F1.PERF_ATC_CD = 'W01P00009' AND F1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '15' GROUP BY O1.BASE_YM, O1.OG_TP_CD, O1.PRTNR_NO HAVING SUM(F1.PERF_VAL) >= 2500000 ) T1 ON O1.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = T1.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' GROUP BY O1.PRTNR_NO UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00035' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* 가동인원 */ , '' AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , SUM(NVL(T1.CNT, 0)) AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT O2.BASE_YM , O2.OG_TP_CD , O2.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO , COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O2 ON O1.BASE_YM = O2.BASE_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = O2.OG_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM TB_FEAM_NTORP_CNTR_MM_CL X1 WHERE O1.BASE_YM = X1.BASE_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = X1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = X1.PRTNR_NO AND X1.CNTR_PERF_CRT_DV_CD = '01' AND X1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = #{feeTcntDvCd} AND X1.PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '101' AND X1.PERF_DV_CD = 0 /*개인판매*/ AND X1.PERF_ATC_CD = 'W01P00009' AND X1.PERF_VAL > 0) GROUP BY O2.BASE_YM, O2.OG_TP_CD, O2.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO ) T1 ON O1.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = T1.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' GROUP BY O1.PRTNR_NO UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00023' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* P추진단-조직배출수 */ , '' AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.ACKMT_YN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGPS_PRTNR_EJT_REL T1 ON O1.BASE_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = T1.BASE_OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = T1.BASE_PRTNR_NO AND T1.OG_EJT_DV_CD = '10' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' GROUP BY O1.PRTNR_NO UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00025' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* P추진단-배출등급 */ , MAX(T1.OG_EJT_GD_CD) AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NULL AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGPS_PRTNR_EJT_REL T1 ON O1.BASE_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = T1.BASE_OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = T1.BASE_PRTNR_NO AND T1.OG_EJT_DV_CD = '10' AND T1.ACKMT_YN = 'Y' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.EJT_NMN_N <= 6 /* 배출후 6개월만 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' GROUP BY O1.PRTNR_NO UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00027' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* P추진단-조직배출수2 */ , '' AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NVL(Z1.CNT, 0) AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT K1.BASE_OG_TP_CD , K1.BASE_PRTNR_NO , COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT T1.BASE_OG_TP_CD , T1.BASE_PRTNR_NO , T1.OJ_OG_TP_CD , T1.OJ_PRTNR_NO , O2.PSTN_DV_CD , O1.PRFMT_DT , O2.RCNTR_DT , CASE WHEN O2.RCNTR_DT IS NULL THEN 12 ELSE CASE WHEN O2.PSTN_DV_CD = 7 THEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(O1.FNL_CLTN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_DATE(O2.RCNTR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD')) ELSE 12 END END AS MON_CNT FROM TB_OGPS_PRTNR_EJT_REL T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 ON T1.MNGT_YM = O1.BASE_YM AND T1.OJ_OG_TP_CD = O1.OG_TP_CD AND T1.OJ_PRTNR_NO = O1.PRTNR_NO AND O1.PRFMT_DMTN_DV_CD = '0' AND O1.PRFMT_DT >= '20230201' -- 2023년 승격자 대상 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O2 ON SUBSTR(O1.FNL_CLTN_DT, 1, 6) = O2.BASE_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{perfYm} AND T1.BASE_OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND T1.OG_EJT_DV_CD = '10' -- 피배출자 AND T1.EJT_NMN_N <= 6 -- 배출후 6개월만 AND T1.ACKMT_YN = 'Y' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) K1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND K1.MON_CNT >= 12 GROUP BY K1.BASE_OG_TP_CD, K1.BASE_PRTNR_NO ) Z1 ON O1.OG_TP_CD = Z1.BASE_OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = Z1.BASE_PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00043' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* P추진단- 피배출자수(피배출자등급아닌가?) */ , '' AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NVL(TO_NUMBER(E1.OG_EJT_GD_CD), 0) AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGPS_PRTNR_EJT_REL E1 ON O1.BASE_YM = E1.MNGT_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = E1.OJ_OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = E1.OJ_PRTNR_NO AND E1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT Y1.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00044' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* P추진단- 등급별조직배출수 */ , '1=' || SUM(Y1.OJ_EJT_GD_CD1) || ',2=' || SUM(Y1.OJ_EJT_GD_CD2) || ',3=' || SUM(Y1.OJ_EJT_GD_CD3) || ',4=' || SUM(Y1.OJ_EJT_GD_CD4) || ',5=' || SUM(Y1.OJ_EJT_GD_CD5) AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NULL AS PERF_VAL FROM ( SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO , T1.OJ_PRTNR_NO , DECODE(T1.OG_EJT_GD_CD, '1', 1, 0) AS OJ_EJT_GD_CD1 , DECODE(T1.OG_EJT_GD_CD, '2', 1, 0) AS OJ_EJT_GD_CD2 , DECODE(T1.OG_EJT_GD_CD, '3', 1, 0) AS OJ_EJT_GD_CD3 , DECODE(T1.OG_EJT_GD_CD, '4', 1, 0) AS OJ_EJT_GD_CD4 , DECODE(T1.OG_EJT_GD_CD, '5', 1, 0) AS OJ_EJT_GD_CD5 FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 INNER JOIN TB_OGPS_PRTNR_EJT_REL T1 ON O1.BASE_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = T1.BASE_OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = T1.BASE_PRTNR_NO AND T1.OG_EJT_DV_CD = '10' -- 피배출자 OJ 피배출자 AND T1.EJT_NMN_N <= 6 /* 배출후 6개월만 */ AND NVL(T1.ACKMT_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O2 ON T1.MNGT_YM = O2.BASE_YM AND T1.OJ_OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND T1.OJ_PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO AND SUBSTR(O2.PRFMT_DT, 1, 6) <= '202301' AND O2.PRFMT_DMTN_DV_CD = '0' -- 승진 WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' ) Y1 GROUP BY Y1.PRTNR_NO UNION ALL
SELECT A.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00033' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* 미팅참석여부 */ , NVL(B.METG_PTCP_ACKMT_YN,'N') AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NULL AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PSCA_MCPTN_METG_AGRG B ON A.BASE_YM = B.AGRG_YM AND A.OG_TP_CD = B.OG_TP_CD AND A.PRTNR_NO = B.PRTNR_NO AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.OG_TP_CD ='W01' AND A.BASE_YM = #{perfYm}
AND A.PSTN_DV_CD = '15'
AND A.PSTN_DV_CD = '7'
UNION ALL SELECT A.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00012' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* 미팅참석일수 */ , '' AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , CASE WHEN NVL(B.METG_PRSC_DC,0) < NVL(C.METG_BASE_DC,10) AND E.EDUC_CRSE_NO IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(C.METG_BASE_DC,10) /* 출석일수가 기준일보다 작고 and 교육존재하면, 미팅참석일수 = 기준일부여 */ WHEN NVL(B.METG_PRSC_DC,0) < NVL(C.METG_BASE_DC,10) AND NVL(B.LDSTC_METG_PRSC_YN,'N') = 'Y' THEN NVL(C.METG_BASE_DC,10) /* 출석일수가 기준일보다 작고 and 원거리이면, 미팅참석일수 = 기준일부여 */ ELSE NVL(B.METG_PRSC_DC,0) END AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PSCA_MCPTN_METG_AGRG B ON A.BASE_YM = B.AGRG_YM AND A.OG_TP_CD = B.OG_TP_CD AND A.PRTNR_NO = B.PRTNR_NO AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PSCA_PRTNR_METG_BASE_BAS C/* 파트너미팅기준기본 */ ON SUBSTR(C.VL_STRTDT,1,6) <= A.BASE_YM AND SUBSTR(C.VL_ENDDT,1,6) >= A.BASE_YM AND C.OG_TP_CD= A.OG_TP_CD AND C.RSB_DV_CD = A.RSB_DV_CD AND NVL (C.QLF_DV_CD,'Z') = NVL(A.QLF_DV_CD,'Z') /* NULL간의 JOIN시 연결이 안되서, 'Z' 로 치환하여 처리함 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PSCA_MCPTN_EDUC_IZ E ON E.EDUC_CRSE_CRT_BASE_YM = A.BASE_YM AND E.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD AND E.PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO AND E.EDUC_CRSE_NO = '14' AND NVL(E.EDUC_CPC_ACKMT_YN,'N') = 'Y' WHERE A.OG_TP_CD ='W01' AND A.BASE_YM = #{perfYm}
AND A.PSTN_DV_CD = '15'
AND A.PSTN_DV_CD = '7'
UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00047' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* P추진단-교육수료여부 */ , NVL(T1.EDUC_CPC_ACKMT_YN, 'N') AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NULL AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PSCA_MCPTN_EDUC_IZ T1 ON O1.BASE_YM = T1.EDUC_CRSE_CRT_BASE_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND T1.EDUC_CRSE_NO = '19' WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '15'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7'
UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00048' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* P추진단-수석플래너자격취득일 */ , T1.UPGR_YM FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NULL AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGPS_TOPMR_PLAR_APLC_IZ T1 ON O1.BASE_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND T1.QLF_DV_CD = '1' WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '15'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7'
UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00045' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* P추진단-이전정착수수료수령여부 */ , NVL2(MAX(F1.FEE_YM), 'Y', 'N') AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NULL AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGPS_TOPMR_PLAR_APLC_IZ O2 ON O1.BASE_YM = O2.MNGT_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO AND O2.UPGR_DMTN_DV_CD = '1' -- 1 승급 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.PRTNR_NO , T1.OG_TP_CD , T1.FEE_CD , T1.PERF_YM AS FEE_YM -- 파티셔닝 속도 이슈가 있어 BASE_YM이 아닌 PERF_YM 사용 FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CALC_BAS T1 WHERE T1.FEE_CD = 'W010005'-- P조직 정착수수료 AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND T1.FEE_CALC_AMT > 0 UNION ALL SELECT T1.PRTNR_NO , T1.OG_TP_CD , T1.FEE_CD , T1.PERF_YM AS FEE_YM -- 파티셔닝 속도 이슈가 있어 BASE_YM이 아닌 PERF_YM 사용 FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CALC_BAS T1 WHERE T1.FEE_CD = 'W020081'-- M조직 정착수수료 AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND T1.FEE_CALC_AMT > 0 AND T1.PERF_YM >= '201904' ) F1 ON F1.PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO AND F1.FEE_YM < O2.UPGR_YM -- 승급전 지급 건만 이전 정착수수료 수령으로 판단 WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '15'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7'
GROUP BY O1.PRTNR_NO UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00041' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* 해약 전 직급 */ , O2.PSTN_DV_CD AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NULL AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O2 ON SUBSTR(O1.FNL_CLTN_DT, 1, 6) = O2.BASE_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '15'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7'
UNION ALL SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO , 'W01P00049' AS PERF_ATC_CD /* P추진단 - 배출여부 */ , CASE WHEN O1.NMN_N <= 6 AND T1.MNGT_YM IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS FEE_PERF_ATC_VAL , NULL AS PERF_VAL FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGPS_PRTNR_EJT_REL T1 ON O1.BASE_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = T1.OJ_OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = T1.OJ_PRTNR_NO AND T1.OJ_PRTNR_PSTN_DV_CD = '7' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '15'
AND O1.PSTN_DV_CD = '7'
) T
